mapper.insert: insert into tb_product_purchase (product_id, product_code, customer_id, price, count, register_date, register_timestamp) values (#{productId}, (select code from tb_product_selling where id = #{productId}), #{customerId}, #{price}, #{count}, (select now()), (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()))
mapper.update: update tb_product_purchase SET delivery_flag = #{delivery_flag}, delivery_id = #{deliviryId}, delivery_date = (select now()), delivery_timestamp = (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{productId}

update tb_product_purchase SET delivery_flag = #{delivery_flag}, delivery_id = #{deliveryId}, delivery_date = (select now()), delivery_timestamp = (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{productId}
